original_title: Comunicado Cinematografico del ERP Nº2: Banco Nacional de Desarrollo
overview: Short that relates how members of the ERP (Ejército Revolucionario del Pueblo) carried out an spectacular blow by entering the vault of the national bank (Banco Nacional de Desarrollo) thanks to the collaboration of two sympathizers of the group.
title: Comunicado Cinematografico del ERP Nº2: Banco Nacional de Desarrollo
